original_text: Tamar put ashes on her head and tore the ornate robe she was wearing. She put her hands on her head and went away, weeping aloud as she went.
korean_text: 다말이 재를 자기의 머리에 덮어쓰고 그의 채색옷을 찢고 손을 머리 위에 얹고 가서 크게 울부짖으니라

sentences.original_text: Tamar put ashes on her head
and tore the ornate robe she was wearing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신이 입고 있던 화려한 옷을 찢었다

sentences.original_text: She put her hands on her head
